CustomField.formula:
IF ( OR( ISPICKVAL(Zuora__Default_Payment_Method__r.Zuora__Type__c , "CreditCard") , ISPICKVAL(Zuora__Default_Payment_Method__r.Zuora__Type__c , "DebitCard") ),
(IF ( ISPICKVAL(Zuora__Default_Payment_Method__r.Zuora__CreditCardExpirationMonth__c, "1") , "01", IF ( ISPICKVAL(Zuora__Default_Payment_Method__r.Zuora__CreditCardExpirationMonth__c, "2") , "02", IF ( ISPICKVAL(Zuora__Default_Payment_Method__r.Zuora__CreditCardExpirationMonth__c, "3") , "03", IF ( ISPICKVAL(Zuora__Default_Payment_Method__r.Zuora__CreditCardExpirationMonth__c, "4") , "04", IF ( ISPICKVAL(Zuora__Default_Payment_Method__r.Zuora__CreditCardExpirationMonth__c, "5") , "05", IF ( ISPICKVAL(Zuora__Default_Payment_Method__r.Zuora__CreditCardExpirationMonth__c, "6") , "06", IF ( ISPICKVAL(Zuora__Default_Payment_Method__r.Zuora__CreditCardExpirationMonth__c, "7") , "07", IF ( ISPICKVAL(Zuora__Default_Payment_Method__r.Zuora__CreditCardExpirationMonth__c, "8") , "08", IF ( ISPICKVAL(Zuora__Default_Payment_Method__r.Zuora__CreditCardExpirationMonth__c, "9") , "09", IF ( ISPICKVAL(Zuora__Default_Payment_Method__r.Zuora__CreditCardExpirationMonth__c, "10") , "10", IF ( ISPICKVAL(Zuora__Default_Payment_Method__r.Zuora__CreditCardExpirationMonth__c, "11") , "11", IF ( ISPICKVAL(Zuora__Default_Payment_Method__r.Zuora__CreditCardExpirationMonth__c, "12") , "12", ""))))))))))))
& "/" & Zuora__Default_Payment_Method__r.Zuora__CreditCardExpirationYear__c), "")
CustomField.label: Credit Card Expiration
